Dell Precision 7760 Mobile Workstation Environmental Assessment
Power Management:
- CPU: Intel Core i9-11950H, Base Power 45W, Turbo 65W
- GPU: NVIDIA RTX A5000, Max Power 165W
- System idle: 25W
- Typical workload: 120W
- Maximum load: 240W
- Sleep mode: 1.8W
Power Supply: 240W adapter, 90% efficiency

Carbon Lifecycle Assessment (LCA):
Manufacturing phase: 850 kg CO2
Use phase (4 years): 1,200 kg CO2 (500W avg, 8h/day, 250 days/year)
End-of-life: -15 kg CO2 (recycling credit)
Total: 2,035 kg CO2

- Chassis: 25% post-consumer recycled plastic
- Packaging: 90% recyclable
- Certifications: EPEAT Gold, ENERGY STAR, TCO Certified
- Repair score: 7/10 (good repairability)

test_dataset.text:
Sony PlayStation 5 Lifecycle Environmental Analysis

Operational Power Consumption:
Gaming (high performance): 150-165W
Gaming (medium settings): 95-110W
Streaming 4K video: 55W
Menu navigation: 45W
Rest mode: 2.5W
Off mode: 0.5W

Lifecycle Carbon Assessment:
Raw materials extraction: 45 kg CO2
Manufacturing: 125 kg CO2
Distribution: 8 kg CO2
Use phase (7 years, 3h/day): 420 kg CO2
End-of-life disposal: 5 kg CO2
Recycling benefit: -12 kg CO2
Net lifecycle total: 591 kg CO2

Circular Economy Initiatives:
Console housing: 15% recycled plastics
Controller: Ocean plastic components
Packaging: 95% plastic-free, FSC certified
Take-back program: Available in 15 countries
Repairability: Modular design, 5/10 iFixit score

Regulatory Compliance:
CE marking, FCC certified, ENERGY STAR qualified
RoHS, WEEE, REACH compliant
